content: a charming little boob by marte fagervik http //arpelia blogspot com http //arpelia etsy com do whatever you want non-commercial with this pattern as long as you credit me preferably with a link to my blog if you decide to not credit me i will think of you as a very rude person and the boob will be sad think of the boobies yarn worsted weight small amount of dark yarn small amount of paler yarn whichever color you want i m sure there are creatures somewhere with green and purple boobs gauge tight tight tight hook i used a 2mm hook with my worsted weight yarn which should give you an idea i go way smaller than the recommended size to avoid holes usually i just grab the smallest hook that will still grab the yarn without splitting it you ll start by knitting the nipple and areola so to begin use the darker yarn start with a magic_ring the kind you use for amigurumi 1 ch1 single_crochet 6 in circle join to first single_crochet with slip_stitch 2 ch1 work even join 6 sts 3 ch1 increase in every stitch around join 12 sts 4 ch1 *single_crochet 1 increase in next stitch* around join 18 sts change color here there s no need to join the rounds anymore since there are no more color changes so just work in a spiral amigurumi style for the rest 5 *single_crochet 2 increase in next stitch* around 24 sts 1/2 6 *single_crochet 3 increase in next stitch* around 30 sts pull starting ring tight and weave in the ends you have so far if the nipple doesn t come out much push it as far out as you can from the inside then sew a running stitch around the circumference of it and tighten it slightly guaranteed to stay perky 7 work even 30 sts 8 work even 30 sts 9 work even 30 sts 10 work even guess what still 30 sts p 11 *single_crochet 3 decrease* around 24 sts 12 *single_crochet 2 decrease* around 18 sts 13 *single_crochet 1 decrease* around 12 sts stuff with small amount of fiberfill or whatever else you have on hand i don t recommend dust bunnies chain or braid a cord of about 5-6 for the loop tie a knot insert crochet hook into work from the outside and pull loop through make sure knot is too large to slip through when pulled on you want the knot to stay on the inside holding on to your precious boob through all possible hardships 14 decrease 6 times 6 sts left cut yarn fasten_off pull through remaining stitches and weave in ends things to do
